originalText.text: I love how clean the pool is but security and staff are very unprofessional , the way they spoke and their aura was very unpleasant and uninviting. they all looked miserable and angry. Like I say if you don't like your job, go find something else that you may enjoy.

text.text: I love how clean the pool is but security and staff are very unprofessional , the way they spoke and their aura was very unpleasant and uninviting. they all looked miserable and angry. Like I say if you don't like your job, go find something else that you may enjoy.

originalText.text:
First Time Here i came with my daughter and son and god daughter place was gorgeous.
When you walk in the entrance its free for everyone and changing rooms is ladies to the left men to the right as you go in..there are black wooden looking stalls that had white curtains inside each stall for changing your clothes and lockers near by... further in you will see the showers to clean off before entering the pool. PHONES are NOT allowed but good news is i saw a few kids with googles on and saw nice colorful beach chairs and some taller wooden grey chairs with a table near them. Display was beautiful and right off the side walk. Clock was very small and far away non noticable so i suggest you bring a watch, overall staff was friendly clam and focused not so much jolly or smiling as much as we hoped, but they was there to work. Overall i had a great time with my family and i would come back again.

originalText.text: The water stay running it is very cold I don’t think anybody will ever have to worry about being too hot this pool isn’t lovely pool

text.text: The water stay running it is very cold I don’t think anybody will ever have to worry about being too hot this pool isn’t lovely pool

originalText.text: Absolutely the worst!! I have been coming here since 2018, no problems w the swim suit. 2021, my daughter went w a group of friends, and she had a swimming skirt on and a swim shirt, that she had been going w for the past 2 years. They did not let her in the deck, she had left her phone in her friends locker. Staff told her to wait outside, and she waited 20 minutes and the lady who had went to look for her friend did not come back. My daughter did a scene of screaming, crying, and cursing at the staff. Then staff decided to send her to get her friend with a life guard, and her friend unlocked the locker, and left. (reason she was wearing a SWIMMING SKIRT is because of our religion.)
